lead_paragraph: Rita Sodi, the chef and owner, taps into lessons learned from the farm north of Florence where she was raised.

byline.contributor: email: petewells@nytimes.com. And follow Pete Wells on Twitter: @pete_wells.

headline.main: The Laws of Tuscan Eating at I Sodi in the West Village

snippet: Rita Sodi, the chef and owner, taps into lessons learned from the farm north of Florence where she was raised.
abstract: Pete Wells reviews restaurant I Sodi in West Village.
